entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
